name: Little Flame (Fiddlebog)
description:
A candle learns of life and loss.

======================================================

Controls:

WASD or arrow keys to move around. Run into things to interact with them.

======================================================

This game was made for the 2020 December Bitsy jam: Candles. This was a solo effort and my first time using the bitsy game engine, but I had fun learning the fundamentals and I hope you enjoy the story. 

There are two separate endings, so make your choice count!
